alert.note: Alert for Niihau in Kauai (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued December 31 at 8:08AM HST until December 31 at 9:30AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 930 AM HST THIS MORNING FOR THE ISLAND OF KAUAI IN KAUAI COUNTY... At 808 AM HST, the stream gauge at the Hanalei River Bridge has been showing that elevated water levels are declining, and little shower activity is occurring on Kauai. Kauai Emergency Management reports that Kuhio Highway remains closed at the Hanalei River. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by heavy rain. SOURCE...Stream Gauges. IMPACT...Flooding in drainages, streams, rivers, roads, properties, and other low-lying areas. Public road closures possible in some areas. Landslides are possible in steep terrain. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Princeville, Hanalei, Wainiha, Haena, Alakai Swamp Trails, Na Pali State Park and Kalihiwai. FLASH FLOOD...GAUGE INDICATED
info.instruction: Stay away from streams, rivers, drainage ditches, and culverts, even if they are currently dry. Do not cross fast flowing or rising water in your vehicle, or on foot. Turn around, don`t drown.
